mapper.insert: insert into board (e_idx, title, content, type, category) values (#{e_idx}, #{title}, #{content}, #{type}, #{category})
mapper.select: select b.*, e.name from board b join employees e on b.e_idx = e.e_idx where b.status = 'N' and b.type = 'normal' order by b.b_idx desc
select b.*, e.name from board b join employees e on b.e_idx = e.e_idx where b.status = 'N' and b.type = 'notice' order by b.b_idx desc
select b.*, e.name from board b join employees e on b.e_idx = e.e_idx where b.status = 'N' and b.type = 'lost' order by b.b_idx desc
select b.*, e.name from board b join employees e on b.e_idx = e.e_idx where b_idx = #{b_idx}
mapper.update: update board set read_cnt = read_cnt+1 where b_idx=#{b_idx}
update board set b_title=#{b_title}, b_content=#{b_content}, update_date = now() where b_idx = #{b_idx}
update board set b_status='Y', update_date = now() where b_idx = #{b_idx}
